channel.title: If i turn off my anti-virus, what will happen? (Norton)
channel.description: If i disable norton anti-virus auto-protect, and i have no viruses on my computer, am i still at risk? Is something going to happen to my computer? same with norton internet security... (i will be playing steam counter-strike)

item.title: If i turn off my anti-virus, what will happen? (Norton)
item.dc:creator: @Tommy2k4 Tommy2k4
item.description:
@Tommy2k4 wrote:

It probably won’t let you disable it because Norton sucks.
